subject: travel policy
body:
Dear Team,
Please issue an outbound travel policy for Mrs. Aline Fersane as per the below conditions: 

Plan requested: $50,000 Silver
Validity: from 2025-08-21 to 2025-08-26 (6 days)
Geographical Zone: Greece (Worldwide excluding USA & Canada)
Destination: Greece
Additional cover: motorcycle coverage 
Address: -2 FLOOR, NIDAL IMAD BLDG, NEXT TO AL KHALAS CHURCH, AIN EL RIHANE./03828980 

Best Regards.
